name: terraledger-carbon-exchange
description: A hyper-transparent, AI-verified carbon credit marketplace built on Hedera Hashgraph

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python api_demo.py
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && flake8 terraledger/
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -e .
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf venv build dist *.egg-info
scripts.docs: echo 'API Documentation available at http://localhost:8000/docs when backend is running'

author: TerraLedger Team
